title: George Davis
deck: I’m George Davis, married to Rosemary. I have 2 grown-up daughters and 4 grandchildren. I play golf two or three times a week, weather permitting, and also fly on my flight simulator on my computer. Together with Rosemary I run the Oasis over 60s café at Gateway on Friday mornings. My desire for those who come to Oasis is to see relationships develop and for them to experience the love of Jesus. I am also part of the Gateway welcome team.
words: An interview with George and Rosemary Davis
